item.title: Ruby Development in the Bar
item.description: For reasons I won't get into, I found myself spending Christmas in Wick on the north east tip of Scotland. This being the second time it's occurred I was familiar with the quirks and isolation of this part of the world. One of the more upswinging things that happens is that every 26th December, there's a charity raffle in the local Seaforth Club. This is where you buy some tickets, drink, win prizes and drink some more.
